url.helpText: Provide the full URL to access the AWS CodeCommit server. e.g. https://url.to.codecommit.server

userName.helpText: The user should have permissions to access and read all information about your project's repository.

region.helpText: Provide the AWS region where your codecommit is located in.

repoName.helpText: Click the connect button to fetch repositories from server. Select from the list of repositories fetched.
